mapper.select:
SELECT table_schema, table_name, table_comment, `engine`, table_collation `collate` FROM information_schema.`TABLES` WHERE table_schema = #{tableSchema} AND table_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{tableName}, '%') AND table_comment LIKE CONCAT('%', #{tableComment}, '%')
AND table_name IN ( #{item} )
ORDER BY table_name

SELECT table_schema, table_name, column_name, IF(LOCATE('unsigned', column_type) > 0, true, false) `unsigned`, IF(LOCATE('auto_increment', extra) > 0, true, false) `auto_increment`, data_type, character_set_name `charset`, collation_name `collate`, character_maximum_length length, column_comment, column_default default_value, IF(LOCATE('CURRENT_TIMESTAMP', extra) > 0, 1, 0) `on_update`, IF(is_nullable = 'NO', true, false) not_Null, ordinal_position FROM information_schema.`COLUMNS` WHERE table_schema = #{tableSchema}
AND table_name IN ( #{item} )
AND column_name IN ( #{item} )
ORDER BY ordinal_position

SELECT column_name, data_type, column_comment, count(*) count FROM information_schema.COLUMNS WHERE 1 = 1 AND table_schema = #{tableSchema} AND table_name = #{tableName} AND column_name = #{columnName}
AND table_name IN ( #{item} )
AND column_name IN ( #{item} )
GROUP BY column_name, data_type, column_comment ORDER BY count DESC

SELECT column_name, data_type, character_maximum_length `length`, column_comment FROM information_schema.COLUMNS WHERE table_schema = #{tableSchema} AND table_name = #{tableName} AND data_type IN ('varchar', 'char', 'text', 'tinytext') AND character_maximum_length IS NOT NULL
